title: ElasticSearch Goes Deep on OpenTelemetry with eBPF Donation
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Elastic is collaborating with OpenTelemetry across various areas, not solely on profiling but also on the common schema and the semantic convention.
cntitle: ElasticSearch 通过 eBPF 捐赠深入 OpenTelemetry
cndescription: Elastic 与 OpenTelemetry 在各个领域展开合作，不仅在分析方面，还在通用架构和语义约定方面。
